The WSAD is IBM enhanced version of ecl=
ipse. It bundles
with JUnit plug in with it. You can use new->Java->JUnit T=
estCase
to create new TestCase, and run as JUnit test to run it.
The relati=
onship between WSAD and eclipse is:
WSAD 5.0 --> eclipse 2.0
WSAD 5.1 --> e=
clipse 2.1
